title: Even the devil polls better
author: VD
content_html: Than Hillary Clinton. I understand Satan himself got 21 percent when matched against Trump. As Mike Cernovich and I have been saying for months, Trump is going to slaughter Clinton. By the time he is done campaigning directly against her, she may not do as well as Mondale or Dukakis.
content_text: Than Hillary Clinton. I understand Satan himself got 21 percent when matched against Trump. As Mike Cernovich and I have been saying for months, Trump is going to slaughter Clinton. By the time he is done campaigning directly against her, she may not do as well as Mondale or Dukakis.
